alert.note: Alert for Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 28 at 2:00PM MDT until October 30 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 20 expected. * WHERE...Zion National Park. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 10 AM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...During the day on Sunday, temperatures will rise back above freezing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
